file_content.text: Think that's most of the gang. Hey, Anspi! Get out here!
You're rescuing me? What am I, your princess?
If you were a princess, you might be worth something.
Shut up and toss me a gun. Who's your friend?
I stole Kaliyo from Nem'ro the Hutt. We've been together ever since.
Kaliyo and I met on Hutta.
Nem'ro, huh? How long were you with him?
Long enough.
You must be Anspi'shel. It's a pleasure to finally meet you.
[Flirt] Hello, gorgeous.
Yeah? How'd a guy like you end up with her?
He has better taste than you'd think. Found him at Nem'ro the Hutt's place, but don't hold that against him.
Wasn't planning to.
Kaliyo and I work together. She's told me a lot about you.
You must be Anspi'shel.
Enough to put me away, or she still getting to the good stuff?
We haven't even talked about Kessel.
You owe me your life. Show some gratitude.
I'm the one who saved you.
Prickly.
Remember Lunya? Like her, but with teeth.
Remember Marto? Like him, but with teeth.
You guys timed it good, by the way--they were gonna hang me to broil on a holosign. You got a way offworld?
Grab your stuff and meet us at the spaceport--I can get you a ride.
You have a plan to get her off Nar Shaddaa?
What happens next?
Your friend's gorgeous. She doesn't compare to you.
[Flirt] She's pretty, but...
Course not. Now--remember I said I had a surprise?
You friend has spirit. Something to admire.
She seemed... nice.
She's not very bright, though. Remember I said I had a surprise for you?
I hope you're not volunteering me to fly her somewhere.
I don't want her on my ship.
Not quite. Remember I said I had a surprise for you?
There's a bounty on Anspi'shel. We saved her, we own her, now we're gonna sell her.
You're serious. You want to give her to a bounty hunter?
I'm not sure I understand.
We came here to rescue her. You told me she saved your life.
She's your friend!
She did. You want to know how?
I suppose I should've seen that coming.
When you put it that way...
Look at me. I owed her for saving my life. But you know how she did that?
She stuffed me in a box and shipped me to Hutta. I spent twelve weeks in muck working for a chem-farmer.
She humiliated me. I owe her for that, too.
Next time you want a favor, give me the full story first.
You should've said something.
I had doubts about this mission from the start. Now I find you've misled me....
I'm not here for your revenge.
You don't have to do anything--I'll handle it, and you get half the money.
She'll be waiting in the hangar either way. Think about it.
Your friend, your call. We'll meet her at the spaceport.
Let's do it, then.
Always knew I liked you. And I promise, the money's gonna be good.
